sub_title: Artificial Lift Europe Operations Supervisor at Halliburton B.V.
summary: I strongly believe that the world needs people who are passionate about the things they do, and of course, I am one of those. I always achieve what I proposed to me to do it and this time you will be surprised why I am your best option. Mechanical engineering is my major and psychology my minor. I am a natural leader, responsible and passionate person continuously seeking opportunities to develop personally and professionally. I love to be a positive, enthusiastic and healthy person.

position_groups:
[{'company': {'id': 2217, 'name': 'Halliburton', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQFtpbHFAokMwQ/company-logo_400_400/0/1654719812153?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Gg_ANNTASNIDmAlg5Rd3znHakC-FJ1zw4MLn73xEWok', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/halliburton/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'Halliburton', 'description': '- Coordinate field service team to ensure flawless execution of Geothermal and Oil ESP services in Europe, increase activity four times YOY in 2022 
- Project manage critical well delivery and install for 5 new geothermal GeoESP across Europe, including new product introduction, rig and crane operation, onshore and offshore.
- Perform fit up and critical well preparation for offshore and onshore for internal requirements or with customer witness
- Coordinate multiproduct service line  (artificial lift – completions) delivery to ensure flawless execution
- Support dismantle investigation and failure analysis (DIFA) for European customer. Expedite DIFA planning to be able to capture lessons learned and apply in redesign and new installs.
- Deliver remote support for install, commissioning, start up, and troubleshooting for ESP equipment 
-Start-up new shop in the Netherlands to support European operation, develop FS and shop team
- Lead and execute most critical geothermal wells in Germany that contributes to double our geothermal market share 
- Improve ESP field service tool containers to reduce job preparation from 2 weeks to 2 days and job time execution by 30%
-	Built first-of-a-kind ESP field service tool containers following 5S methodology to minimize job time execution and improve inventory management 
- Built a diverse and inclusive team in a multicultural workspace', 'title': 'Operations Supervisor', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Halliburton', 'description': '2021 Q2 Technical Support in USA and LATAM

- Identified, proposed and implemented improvements for the VSD application software focused on HMI experience, operational firmware, peripherals intercommunication and SCADA
- Project managed the fit-up tests, painting and crating of GeoESPs for Europe
- Focal point of InteLIFT deployment in LATAM
- Lead the first-of-a-kind livestreaming of an ESP pulling from a remote location in Ecuador
- Trained field specialist and customers about VSD technology in Ecuador, Mexico and Colombia
- Created and directed the Artificial Lift Field Service training videos for field specialist in a global level
- Troubleshooting and technical support to VSD field specialists

2021 Q1 International Assignment in Mexico

- Perform flawless first ESP installation and commissioning for a new customer
- Recognized as the first front-line customer service
- Responsible of surface equipment commissioning and start-up', 'title': 'Field Service Engineer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'Halliburton', 'description': '2020-Q4 Technical support in Ecuador

-  Commissioning of a HPS System focused on the VSD operation.
-  Lead the deployment of 6 helmet cameras to be use in Artificial Lift operations worldwide.
-  Pre-commissioning of the first SPOC-VSD to be introduced in the Ecuadorian market.
-  Accelerated ESP field service exposure in the United States

2020-Q3 International Assignment in Mexico

-  Part of the team that initialized ESP Operations in Mexico.
-  Quick adaptability to laws, procedures, and culture in Halliburton Mexico.
-  Built solid client relationship which translated into a successful delivery of ESP equipment valued in $900K.
-  Compiled records for ordering shipping and receiving materials by administering requisition of available stock, additional stock, return of broken and non-receipt of stock.
-  Support the project management of the ESP operations in Mexico which leads to be locally recognized as the PSL supervisor.
-  Pre-commissioning and commissioning of 4 ESP Surface Skids (AFE VSD + SUT) and the delivery logistics to the final costumer.

Advance application Team (AAT)

- Part of the AAT that gives technical support worldwide for tenders, operations, ESP sizing and remote monitoring.
- Deep knowledge about multiphase flow correlations, nodal analysis, ESP sizing and VSD instrumentation and control.
- Identified differences, advantages and disadvantages between third-party ESP Sizing software like SubPump, Prosper, and company-owned software.
- Co-directed the implementation of the first ESP Monitoring plataform (Well Lynx) Halliburton Artificial Lift International (Outside US).
- Developed communication architectures for WellPads of more than 10 Wells.', 'title': 'Advance Applications Engineer', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Ecuador', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 11, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Halliburton', 'description': 'At the Igapo project

- Developed failure analysis and detection in VSDs, transformers, and ESPs
- Preventive and predictive maintenance of ESP systems including thermographic analysis, harmonics monitoring, sine filter useful life detection and condition monitoring of the motor
- Perform condition monitoring of more than 40 wells with ESPs completion
- Execute electrical condition monitoring of motors, VSDs, harmonic distortion under the IEEE 519 and power factor
- Quality acceptance of ESP installations
- Surface hydraulic simulations using a nodal analysis approach
